In three sentences
Comments
The campus is very clean, and safe as far as I have noticed.
None that I know of.
Honor Society Membership eligible with GPA 3.5.
Single parents, adult learners, people without transportation, and people who can complete tasks without supervision.
None that I know of yet.
There aren't as many financial aid options at Rio as I expected, but scholarships can assist.
Spend time with my beautiful daughters. We like to swim, shop, take lots of photos, and play games together.
There is a cafe in the building, but I have never been there,
This college does not offer dorm residency.
The coursework can be extremely difficult at times. When feeling overwhelmed, seek tutoring, which is available from the school. It would be nice if the hours for tutoring were more available though.

Always be sure to set aside specific time for studies, even if you don't have assignments due. Don't assume that since it is an at home course that it wont be difficult. Keep your focus and stick to a schedule for the best results.

The distance learning option and frequent start times gave me the opportunity to go back to school, its very flexible. The staff is on their game, from offering assistance, to responding to questions quickly, they are always there to help, This is the perfect way to earn a degree, and I am actually learning!

textAfterTable: Am learning a lot Love, Love, Love this school. I can work at my own pace. Learning new things every day, and the teachers? They are amazing, they care about if you are struggling to need an extension. Login to rate or flag the reviews Daniel from Phoenix, AZ 01/23/2012 Reviewer is A current student here. 3 out of 3 people found this review useful. 3 of 62 Categories Comments Bang for the buck for in county residents, it is a very inexpensive option. Food and Dining do not live on/near campus Dorm Life do not live in dorms, or even know if the college has dorms. Tips for prospective students give it a shot. make sure that you set a study schedule and stick to it.
